C

ClassificationHandler - Class in it.unimib.disco.essere.core
Class for execute all the operations concerning: the building and serialization of the classifiers, the printing of the human-readable result, the cross validation and the weka experiment.
ClassificationHandler(Loader, String) - Constructor for class it.unimib.disco.essere.core.ClassificationHandler
Create an instance of a ClassificationHandler
classify() - Method in class it.unimib.disco.essere.core.ClassificationHandler
Build all the classifiers contained by the list classifiers (the first attribute)
classify() - Method in class it.unimib.disco.essere.core.InputParser
Call the method that will build all the classifiers
cross() - Method in class it.unimib.disco.essere.core.InputParser
Call the method that will perform the cross validation
crossValidation(int, int) - Method in class it.unimib.disco.essere.core.ClassificationHandler
Perform a cross validation
crossValidation(Instances, Classifier) - Method in class it.unimib.disco.essere.functionalities.DataEvaluator
Perform the crossvalidation using the default value for fold (10) and seed (1)
crossValidation(Instances, Classifier, int, int) - Method in class it.unimib.disco.essere.functionalities.DataEvaluator
Perform the cross validation
CustomClassifierSplitEvaluator - Class in it.unimib.disco.essere.experiment
This is one of the classes that allows to perform a custom weka experiment

customExp(int, int) - Method in class it.unimib.disco.essere.core.ClassificationHandler
Perform a custom experiment, which is basically a standard weka experiment where folds are created before the execution and then executed concurrently
customExp() - Method in class it.unimib.disco.essere.core.InputParser
Call the method that will perform a custom experiment, which is basically a standard weka experiment where folds are created before the execution and then executed concurrently
